title: Help with client!!! stuck on 0
body: I had recently downloaded patch 6.14 and now it is stuck on 0 can someone please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is the patcher attempting to scan files? Please allow this to complete.

Let me know if you receive an error eventually.
I've let it run for 12 hrs and it was stuck on 95% the whole night so idk

> [{quoted}](name=Midwastaken,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=txzTlH6o,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-20T09:57:26.509+0000)
>
> I've let it run for 12 hrs and it was stuck on 95% the whole night so idk

Sorry to hear that! Please try the solutions in this thread and let me know if anything works for you:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions
